name: Pale Blue Dot (itsNemo)
description:
Pale Blue Dot is a short interactive fiction about the creation of life and exploration of human desires. 

Consider again that dot. That's here, that's home, that's us. On it everyone you love, everyone you know, everyone you ever heard of, every human being who ever was, lived out their lives. 

Explore that dot.

Any feedback would be appreciated. Also if you enjoyed the game any donations would be greatly appreciated. 

Credits

A Game by Daum Park @itsDaumPark
Art by Kuniki and NightSoundGames

Controls of the game

Right Mouse Click + Drag - move your camera
Mouse Scroll in/out - zoom camera

R - Restart Game
Esc- Quit Game
